urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @Made_of_Kent Hi There! You can also reach us via Live Chat. After having a small conversation with our virtual assistant, an agent will join the conversation in a few minutes based on the availability of our agents: https://t.co/1PjrVsFfuE. We kindly ask for your patience in the meantime.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @Ben_Surtees Hi Benedict! You can get one item checked in for free for the baby. If the baby does not have a seat on the aircraft, you can give the car seat for free as a checked-in bag, but the other items like the stroller cannot be checked-in for free. You can buy an extra checked-in bag.

data.text: @DJTReal7 Hi David! If you submitted a claim and waiting for a response for compensation, our colleagues have 30 days to respond. But if you are asking for a refund from the flight that got canceled, you should receive the refund in 2 weeks. You can contact us via:https://t.co/8CU9BVbiW6

data.text: Want to challenge and excite every one of your senses? Marrakesh is the destination you're looking for! Head to Africa's first cultural capital to discover local delicacies, or learn a bit in museums. Book now from London with WIZZ! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOslh5 https://t.co/ybpriMDB4Q

data.text: @Timothreus @premierinn @easyJet Hi Tim! Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience. You can submit a claim via https://t.co/pbvIba3iTE and you can attach the invoices of the spending or indicate the amount you paid in your claim that is caused by the cancellation. Thank you for your cooperation.

data.text: @nikosft Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.

data.text: @fgarces26 Hi there! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

@lamatriarcabel If you haven't done the online check-in beforehand and airport check-in is not added in your reservation then you'll be charged an extra fee all times. Thank you for the understanding.

@nitheshgowda Hi. Since WIZZ is not operating connection flights, you always have to leave the transit zone, check out then check-in again to your next flight. So all the requirements of entering the country applies.

data.text: @koleDey Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @GawinGoska Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.
